---
title: "Final Interview Questions"
subtitle: "EMSE 4575: Exploratory Data Analysis"
output: html_document

---

```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

questions <- read_csv("questions.csv") %>% 
    distinct(category, question) %>% 
    rename(Question = question) %>% 
    mutate(
        category = str_replace(category, "_", " "),
        category = str_to_title(category), 
        category = ifelse(
            str_detect(category, "Projects"), "Projects", category),
        Number = row_number()) %>% 
    select(Category = category, Number, Question)
```

You will be asked 10 questions from the list below.

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
questions %>% 
    kbl() %>% 
    kable_paper(full_width = F) %>%
    collapse_rows(1) %>% 
    column_spec(1, width = "0.5em")
```
